subject: [R] similarity
body:
HelloI have a question about performing a similarity analysis using R.I will perform a similarity analysis comparing species.I have a datamatrix that looks like the Pictures you can see in the  mail. It contains bivariate data and data in this Min Max mode.
I had to alter the multivariate data into min max, because I had more  than one number in one species and also I had to alter the unordered  multivariate data into bivariate data for the same reason. Now I am  looking for a similarity algorithm or approach  in R that is able to  deal with this data and further gives the possibility to weight the  variables differently.
By the way it would be fine if this approach would be also able to  treat numerical data. I hope somebody can help me.
Best regards
Birgit



\ufffc   \ufffc
